name: phenotypical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the physical characteristics of something living, especially those characteristics that can be seen: The cells have a normal phenotypical appearance. As part of the study, we evaluated phenotypical variations in the two populations.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cells appeared to have undergone phenotypical changes.Our aim is to gain a better understanding of the phenotypical characteristics of these insects.The scientists observed visible phenotypical differences between the specimens.Gradual phenotypical change accounts for the diversity and complexity of life on Earth.These are phenotypical traits and are therefore influenced by both genetic and environmental factors.
